name: Dragon Evolution - Dragons Merge Clicker Game
name_original: Dragon Evolution - Dragons Merge Clicker Game
description:
You’re definitely gonna hear these ones ROAR! The amazing and hungry dragons are now in the EVOLUTION series! Feeling like a real WARRIOR? Come meet these big guys that are so cool they will BURN everything UP!

In this evolution game, you’ll have to prove yourself to be the DRAGON MASTER in a fantasy world! Control all your nice beasts - but get out of their way if they accidentally sneeze some fire - and make money out of it to get to the final dragon!

HOW TO PLAY
🐉 Drag and drop similar dragons to create new mysterious and mutant creatures (merge dragons into powerful ones)

HIGHLIGHTS
🐉 Different levels and many different dragon types to discover and reveal a final mistery
🐉 Watch out for the impostors that will get in your way!
🐉 Dragons can be funny: put on crazy HATS in your dragons and make them unique!

Make sure all your fire alarms are working and enjoy this amazing adventure!

Breed dragons -> merge dragons -> evolve dragons and start again infinite times!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
